content:
'pharmacy-type' parameter example is invalid on https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/branches/stu2-draft/search_parameters.html

Recommend:
GET [base]/Basic?pharmacy-type=[system]|[code]

Also, on https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/branches/stu2-draft/artifacts.html#2
Section 6.0.2 Behavior: Search Parameters

'drug-name' description should indicate access to a FormularyDrug (MedicationKnowledge) not a drug plan

Great. Thanks for the notice. Keep it coming. There has been a lot of work in a very little amount of time and draft STU2 has not had much review on the narrative parts. So we welcome the review and comments.
